title: El Anatsui's Old Man's Cloth viewer experience

content.question: El Anatsui’s Old Man’s Cloth is experienced differently by viewers each time it is displayed because the work

choices.label: is added to in a gradual process of enlargement
degrades quickly and so elements are replaced
takes a new shape each time it is hung

content.answer: takes a new shape each time it is hung
